name: Aurora (itch) (heckadactyl)
description:
After your sister is kidnapped by an evil corporation and experimented on,  the hunt begins for you - Dyne, her brother, who must rescue her before they put you both in the lab together and use you for nanotech mind control experiments.

This is a very rough prototype created for the 32 bit game jam 2021. I bit off a bit more than I can chew so it is rather rough around the edges and it was a real race against time trying to code everything in time (I'm still a beginner), but I hope you enjoy what I managed to fit in. 

Please note: This game only supports a CONTROLLER / Gamepad right now. I'm working on trying to get mouse support! Sorry! I ran out of time for the gamejam submission. 

Credits: I used the Synty Sci fi pack for this. Code & music by me (heckadactyl) and Kat helped with the level layout. :)
